content:
NATIONAL SERVICE SCHEME

    Five NSS units are functioning in our college with a total strength of volunteers of 500 students. Annual special camps are conducted every year for the NSS volunteers in nearby places wherein students are exposed to various social activities. Experts and scholars are invited during the camps to address the students as an awareness programs. Other activities are Campus cleaning, Tree planting and Creating social/health awareness among the Public. Two volunteers in the last three years have attended Republic Day Parade. One of the NSS Program officers is in charge of Red Ribbon Club. One volunteer has been awareded as a State Level Best Volunteer during 2012 - 2013.
